data.title: College Visit
data.text: We stopped here for lunch after a college visit at University of Kentucky. It was a nice place. The service was good and the pizza was fantastic!

data.title: One of the more unusual lunches ever
data.text: It was evident when we arrived st noon that they were unprepared for the football game crowd.  There was no hostess to be found and when she did arrive she said the kitchen was backed up and it would be an hour.  Our sweet waitress apologized profusely even when our order finally arrived and it was all wrong.  We never saw management.  And a vagrant man wandered around the restaurant asking each table to buy him a beer. I went to the restroom and there were no towels.  I told the waitress and it wasn't corrected when I returned 30 min later.  I doubt we will return here.

data.title: Take out for tailgate
data.text: We stopped here and got the funky chicken pizza. And it was the right choice.  We took it to our tailgate. And for those who had not been to Lexington. And had this before it was a hit. I used to come here all the time in college. You are always afraid that it might change. But not the case here. So in closing if you want pizza you have on choice and that's PAZZO'S

data.title: Decent food horrible service
data.text: Service is very very very slow especially since they aren't overwhelmingly busy. Food is good and Sunday slices are a great deal.

data.title: Great campus spot--catch aUK game here!
data.text: Pazzos has great pizza and subs, and a ton of beer and other drinks. The pizza is pretty good, but the biggest attraction is the location and sports ambiance. Watching a basketball game here is SO fun, as long as you're not a Lousiville fan 😏. Definitely a great place to watch a game.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text:
Came for lunch with friends... This place is bigger then it looks on the outside... They have a parking lot in back so we made the mistake of coming in that way.... It was a maze finding the hostess stand! Walk around the building and come in the front! 

Now for the food.... The pizza was awesome! My favorite pizza so far out of any others in the area... The sauce was yummy... The crust was a little oily around the edges but the rest of the pizza made up for it... I got a small two topping (10inch) and a soda and my to a little over $15... Not to bad considering I brought home leftovers....  They do have some type of lunch express that is cheaper and you can buy pizza by the slice... We saw someone else with a salad of some type that was huge and looked yummy... May try the salad next time... And there will be a next time! Lol. Oh and they have a huge drink menu! I'm sure it is very popular with the college crowd on the weekend but it wasn't very busy for lunch through the week. Plenty of spaces in the parking lot.

data.title: This place is AWESOME
data.text: They have the greatest pizza in the state! Everything is delicious here.  The beer selection is amazing.  They don't have a lot of places to sit but it's worth it if you have to wait.  I love this pizza

data.title: Good Italian food on the edge of the University of Kentucky campus
data.text: This is a nice restaurant that serves pizza, sandwiches and salads.  They sell pizza by the slice and the slices are very large.  My favorites are the pizza slices and the BLT sub.

data.title: Quick Thursday Visit
data.text: Stopped in for a quick dinner and beer and ended up AMAZED by the selection of both. The pizza is excellent hand tossed with top notch ingredients. The beer is relatively inexpensive for the quality of the brands and certainly worth the cost. The wings are oven baked, but we got the "extra crispy" which was a good choice. Some of thr help is a little flighty but still worth the time and $

data.title: Great chicken wings and pizza
data.text: I was with a group of young adults and parents, and there were about 15-18 people. We were quickly seated, on a Saturday night, and had fantastic service.  The food was very good.  We were seated in an outdoor seating area that was completely covered and heated, and had visual access to two or three tvs in our immediate area.  It was very cold outside (high of 20 that day) and we were all comfortable inside the large seating area.

data.title: Beer around the world
data.text: I love that they have so many different beers from around the world. Every time I come there they have something new I can try. Plus their pizza is also great!

data.title: Good Pizza and Beer
data.text: Watched the Clemson game and had some food and beer.  Pizza was very good and pretzels were as well.  Service was good and attentive.  Not crowded so that might have helped.  Would go back.

data.title: Great Pizza in a College Setting
data.text: We went there for lunch over the Holiday Break so suspect the ability to get a table right away was a function of the college students being home, but... we were able to sit right down and the waitress was there in less than a few minutes.  We ordered 10 inch personal pizzas and they were more than enough. Pazzo's offered a variety of custom or specialized pizzas (I ordered the one with bourbon bbq sauce and that was a winner).  The pizza had thicker crust and definitely worth the time there before leaving for home.  It was also right next to campus with plenty of other food options and UK Bookstore close by.

data.title: Nice Surprise
data.text: We stopped in on the spur of the moment sort of thing.  We saw the fat tire sign in the window and needed a beer.  Their beer selection is pretty good with something for every taste.  I went with a locally produced IPA while my wife got a Bud Light. We ordered an appetizer which was just ok.  The appetizer selection was somewhat limited.  We ordered a pizza which was cooked perfect; the crust was thin and somewhat crunchy.  We really like the pizza but it all depends upon what you like.  Don't expect your run of the mill pizza like Jets, Papa Johns, Dominos etc...We also went before UK was in session, so that may have made a difference as we had a great outdoor seat and was able to have a great conversation.

data.title: good pizza and a lot of beer
data.text: They have a lot of different beers and the pizza is good, it is just always crowded and full of college kids.........

data.title: Superb Food!
data.text:
We ate at Pazzo's while on vacation and liked it so much we tried to eat there several times.  The pizza combinations were incredible and we even ordered some to go.  The atmosphere was fun, but due to being there during xmas break it was a bit slow, however, the wait for a server was very long and they never came back to our table after dropping off food.  LOL
Anyhow, they could have thrown the pizza at me and I'd still say it's the best pizza I've had in over a year.  :)

data.title: nothing special
data.text: It is your average pizzeria with no special desserts and usual pizzas. Nothing great but not bad either.

data.title: We keep trying...no more...
data.text: Again disappointed with Pazzos. We used to eat here years ago and it was great but quit when pizzas were undercooked continuously. So we tried again this summer but went with subs and surprise it was awesome. So tonight our friends who really like Pazzos asked us to go again. We went ... Total disappointment we ordered pretzels and salad which were good then forget it pizza was missing topping and calazone missing pepperoni and side item... The server was nonchalant went to kitchen eventually came back said they'd remake calazone and discount pizza... Calazone eventually showed up after every one else finished eating... I asked for water which I never got and had to ask for another beer. Overall complete disappointment we won't be going back... We had looked forward to it and well... It takes slot for me to write a bad review only second one in a long time. I tried to find a place on their website to post something but was unable. Ah well at least we tried it again... No more...

data.title: Good beer and great pizza
data.text: Love the pizza, calzones and beer selection here. The atmosphere is really fun too. The only problem is the service is super super slow no matter the time of day or how busy they are. Some people complained about the noise but it is right next to campus and it is a pizza joint/bar. It is not a quiet candlelit meal. Anyway, I highly recommend just be prepared to wait.

data.title: Good beer selection, decent food
data.text: Pazzo's is a good place to hang out and have a few beers, and it has a nice environment for watching games on the many TVs they have.  Sometimes it has more of a college bar feel which can be good or bad depending on your perspective.
